mapper.sql: DELIVERY_STOCK_ID AS deliveryStockId, PD_CODE AS pdCode, NORMS_CODE AS normsCode, APPLY_DELIVERY_NUM AS applyDeliveryNum, CONFIRM_DELIVERY_NUM AS confirmDeliveryNum, PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM AS planDeliveryNum, ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM AS actualDeliveryNum, MEMO AS memo
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_delivery_stock_detail (
DELIVERY_STOCK_ID,
PD_CODE,
NORMS_CODE,
APPLY_DELIVERY_NUM,
CONFIRM_DELIVERY_NUM,
PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM,
ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM,
DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME ) VALUES (
#{deliveryStockId},
#{pdCode},
#{normsCode},
#{applyDeliveryNum},
#{confirmDeliveryNum},
#{planDeliveryNum},
#{actualDeliveryNum},
#{delFlg}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT stockDetail.DELIVERY_STOCK_ID AS deliveryStockId, stockDetail.PD_CODE AS pdCode, stockDetail.NORMS_CODE AS normsCode, stockDetail.ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM AS actualDeliveryNum, stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM AS actualReceiveNum FROM ds_delivery_stock_detail AS stockDetail WHERE stockDetail.DELIVERY_STOCK_ID = #{deliveryStockId} AND stockDetail.PD_CODE=#{pdCode}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_delivery_stock (
DELIVERY_STOCK_ID,
DIST_MONTH,
LGCS_CODE,
SUPP_CODE,
HALF_CODE,
DELIVERY_STOCK_STATUS,
DELIVERY_WAREHOUSE_ADDR,
DELIVERY_RESPON_NAME,
DELIVERY_RESPON_TEL,
DELIVERY_EXECUTE_NAME,
DELIVERY_EXECUTE_TEL,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_NAME,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_NAME,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_TEL,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_NAME,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_TEL,
DELIVERY_MEMO,
STOCK_MEMO,
DELIVERY_STOCK_TIME_REQ,
STOCK_ADDR,
STOCK_RESPON_NAME,
STOCK_RESPON_TEL,
STOCK_EXECUTE_NAME,
STOCK_EXECUTE_TEL,
DELIVERY_RECEIVE_STOCK_TIME,
DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME ) VALUES (
#{deliveryStockId},
#{distMonth},
#{lgcsCode},
#{suppCode},
#{halfCode},
#{deliveryStockStatus},
#{deliveryWarehouseAddr},
#{deliveryResponName},
#{deliveryResponTel},
#{deliveryExecuteName},
#{deliveryExecuteTel},
#{transportUnitName},
#{transportUnitResponName},
#{transportUnitResponTel},
#{transportUnitExecuteName},
#{transportUnitExecuteTel},
#{deliveryMemo},
#{stockMemo},
#{deliveryStockTimeReq},
#{stockAddr},
#{stockResponName},
#{stockResponTel},
#{stockExecuteName},
#{stockExecuteTel},
#{deliveryReceiveStockTime},
#{delFlg}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime} )
mapper.update: update ds_delivery_stock set DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth}, LGCS_CODE=#{lgcsCode}, SUPP_CODE=#{suppCode}, HALF_CODE=#{halfCode}, DELIVERY_STOCK_STATUS=#{deliveryStockStatus}, DELIVERY_RECEIVE_STOCK_TIME=#{deliveryReceiveStockTime}, DELIVERY_WAREHOUSE_ADDR=#{deliveryWarehouseAddr}, DELIVERY_RESPON_NAME=#{deliveryResponName}, DELIVERY_RESPON_TEL=#{deliveryResponTel}, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_NAME=#{deliveryExecuteName}, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_TEL=#{deliveryExecuteTel}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_NAME=#{transportUnitName}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_NAME=#{transportUnitResponName}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_TEL=#{transportUnitResponTel}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_NAME=#{transportUnitExecuteName}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_TEL=#{transportUnitExecuteTel}, DELIVERY_MEMO=#{deliveryMemo}, STOCK_MEMO=#{stockMemo}, DELIVERY_STOCK_TIME_REQ=#{deliveryStockTimeReq}, STOCK_ADDR=#{stockAddr}, STOCK_RESPON_NAME=#{stockResponName}, STOCK_RESPON_TEL=#{stockResponTel}, STOCK_EXECUTE_NAME=#{stockExecuteName}, STOCK_EXECUTE_TEL=#{stockExecuteTel}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime} WHERE DELIVERY_STOCK_ID=#{deliveryStockId}
mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_STOCK_ID AS deliveryStockId, DIST_MONTH AS distMonth, LGCS_CODE AS lgcsCode, SUPP_CODE AS suppCode, HALF_CODE AS halfCode, DELIVERY_STOCK_STATUS AS deliveryStockStatus, DELIVERY_WAREHOUSE_ADDR AS deliveryWarehouseAddr, DELIVERY_RESPON_NAME AS deliveryResponName, DELIVERY_RESPON_TEL AS deliveryResponTel, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_NAME AS deliveryExecuteName, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_TEL AS deliveryExecuteTel, TRANSPORT_UNIT_NAME AS transportUnitName, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_NAME AS transportUnitResponName, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_TEL AS transportUnitResponTel, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_NAME AS transportUnitExecuteName, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_TEL AS transportUnitExecuteTel, DELIVERY_MEMO AS deliveryMemo, STOCK_MEMO AS stockMemo, DELIVERY_STOCK_TIME_REQ AS deliveryStockTimeReq, STOCK_ADDR AS stockAddr, STOCK_RESPON_NAME AS stockResponName, STOCK_RESPON_TEL AS stockResponTel, STOCK_EXECUTE_NAME AS stockExecuteName, STOCK_EXECUTE_TEL AS stockExecuteTel, DEL_FLG AS delFlg, CRT_ID AS crtId, CRT_TIME AS crtTime, UPD_ID AS updId, UPD_TIME AS updTime FROM ds_delivery_stock WHERE DELIVERY_STOCK_ID = #{filterMap.deliveryStockId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual ( SUPP_DS_ID, VIRTUAL_STOCK_ACTUAL_ID, DIST_MONTH, LGCS_CODE, SUPP_CODE, PD_STOCK_TYPE, HALF_CODE, CLASSES_CODE, BREED_CODE, FEATURE_CODE, GRADE_CODE, OUT_SPEC, OUT_NW, MACHINING_CODE, PD_CODE, NORMS_CODE, INPUT_DATE, OLD_ACTUAL_NUM, NEW_ACTUAL_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER) SELECT actual.SUPP_DS_ID,#{filterMap.virtualStockActualId},actual.DIST_MONTH,actual.LGCS_CODE,actual.SUPP_CODE, #{filterMap.pdStockTypeTo},actual.HALF_CODE ,actual.CLASSES_CODE,actual.BREED_CODE,actual.FEATURE_CODE,actual.GRADE_CODE,actual.OUT_SPEC,actual.OUT_NW,substring(actual.PD_CODE,3,1),actual.PD_CODE,actual.NORMS_CODE ,#{filterMap.inputDate},0,#{filterMap.newActualNum},0,#{crtId},#{crtTime},#{crtId},#{crtTime} ,NULL,NULL,1 FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual AS actual WHERE actual.DIST_MONTH=#{filterMap.distMonth} AND actual.LGCS_CODE=#{filterMap.areaCode} AND actual.SUPP_CODE=#{filterMap.supplierCode} AND actual.PD_STOCK_TYPE = #{filterMap.pdStockTypeFm} AND actual.HALF_CODE = #{filterMap.halfCode} AND actual.PD_CODE = #{filterMap.pdCode} AND actual.DEL_FLG = 0 LIMIT 0,1;
